note.p: Daughter of Mary Ann Steer and Alexander Steer, tailor, of Limpsfield, Surrey. Married William Jackson, butler at Down House, at Down in 1880.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/446/76/11), 1881 (RG11/855/92/20)
Surrey, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 17 December 2019)
